responses.rationale: The segment contains a low-risk adjective ('negligible') but no minimiser combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment contains explicit calming language ('peace of mind') but no minimiser combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment describes an increase ('risen rapidly') but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The segment uses vivid language ('Screaming very loud', 'whole-body tremors') but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The phrase 'just one mutation away' uses the minimiser 'just' with 'one mutation' and the scale context 'away from... becoming a major pandemic virus'.
The segment describes an increase ('risen rapidly') but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The phrase 'just is not infecting' uses a minimiser ('just') but lacks an explicit scale contrast (e.g., 'out of X').
Referring to the patient as a 'one-off' functions as a minimiser ('a single instance') combined with the scale contrast that 'no close contacts had become sick'.
The segment discusses prioritizing vaccination but contains no minimiser or scale contrast.
The phrase 'exports just a fraction of the poultry it produces' uses the minimiser 'just' with 'a fraction' and the scale 'of the poultry it produces'.
The segment contains a bare negation ('do not indicate a nationwide shortage') but no minimiser combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment contains a bare negation ('don't think... necessarily any more worrying') and a psychological verb ('worries me') but no minimiser or scale contrast.
The phrase 'just over one million had died or been culled' uses the minimiser 'just' with the quantity 'one million' and the explicit scale 'Of these [8.5 to 9 million birds]'.
